## Description {#details}

This is used by <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/aggressiveinstcombine/aggressiveinstcombine-cpp/#a32ffe3fd425265e0290c803c36cc1612">foldAnyOrAllBitsSet()</a> to capture a source value (Root) and the bit indexes (Mask) needed by a masked compare.

If we&#39;re matching a chain of &#39;and&#39; ops, then we also need to capture the fact that we saw an &quot;and X, 1&quot;, so that&#39;s an extra return value for that case.
